responses: Bot: Hello! How can I help?
Bot: What can I do for you?
Bot: Thanks for talking to me! Have a great day!
Bot: I am the CSUF Portal Bot! I can help answer questions about the CSUF Portal!

patterns: where can i see my classes
how can i find my classes
can you help me find my classes
responses:
Bot: Log into the CSUF Portal and follow these instructions to view your classes: 
1. Click on Titan Online icon on the top right (cube icon) 
2. Click on 'Student Homepage' to open your student profile 
3. Click on 'Manage Classes' to view classes your currently taking

patterns: where can i get academic adiving
how can i get academic advising
responses:
Bot: For general academic adivising, log into CSUF Portal and follow these instructions: 
1. On the left search bar and search 'advising' to reduce options in USER APPS 
2. Click on the 'Academic Adivising Student' under USER APPS 
3. Click on 'Virtual Academic Advising Center' to arrive at the Academic Advising Center webpage. 
  Appointments and pop-in adivising are available here 
 
For department specific academic advising, your have better luck doing the following: 
1. Go on your prefered search engine 
2. Search up 'CSUF', your department, and 'academic advising' and clicking on the first CSUF link. 
3. On your department homepage you can find a place to schedule an appointment

patterns: What days do we have off?
Where can i find the academic calendar?
Do you know when our next day off school is?
What holidays do we have off?
responses: Bot: You can view the academic calender here: https://apps.fullerton.edu/AcademicCalendar

patterns: Can you help me get to my canvas?
can i get the link to my canvas
how do I get to canvas
responses: Bot: Log into the CSUF Portal and use this link to get to your canvas dashboard: https://csufullerton.instructure.com

BOT: If you need help immediately, call (800) 273-8255 for Natioanl Suicide Prevention Lifeline 
 
If you like to schedule an appointment with a CSUF councelor, call the Counseling & Psychology Service number (657) 278-3040. 
We offer counseling for individial, couple, group, psychiatric and crisis. For more information visit: https://www.fullerton.edu/caps/services/appointments/appointment.php

patterns: lot A or Lot G parking
responses: Bot: You can view the available parking spot here: https://parking.fullerton.edu/ParkingLotCounts/mobile.aspx

patterns: where can i get a parking permit?
how do i get a parking permit
How do i pay off my parking citation
where do i pay my parking citation
would like to appeal my parking citation
would like to add my car to my account
responses:
Bot: Log into the CSUF Portal and use this link to go to the Parking Portal: https://csufparking.t2hosted.com/Account/Portal 
 
Here you can view parking services: permits, parking citations, and vehicle registration
